title: 1.3 Master Challenge 2
question: A bank offers 3% compound interest calculated yearly. A customer deposits $5000 on the 1st of January. Calculate the amount he would have gained at the end of the third year. Write a pseudocode and JavaScript code to calculate the compound interest. Here the principal amount is $5000 , the interest rate is 3% , and the time is 3 years.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
